General.Name: Softcen Co. Ltd
General.Description: Softcen Co., Ltd. offers big data solutions and services. The company collects, analyzes, manages, and distributes medical, pharmaceutical, and bio information using cloud and big data infrastructure and IT capabilities. It also provides IT solutions in analytics, commerce, IoT, hybrid cloud, social, system, and security areas; and IT infrastructure, such as pre-consulting, infrastructure construction, and integrated maintenance services. The company formerly known as BTC Korea Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Softcen Co., Ltd. in April 2014. Softcen Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
